name: Donquixote Doflamingo
type: The Seven Warlords of the Sea/Donquixote Pirates
effect: If you have 2 or less Life cards, this Character gains [Rush]. (This card can attack on the turn in which it is played.) [Opponent's Turn] [On K.O.] Add up to 1 card from the top of your deck to the top of your Life cards.
